title: Naturopathic Medicine — Riverside Healing Center
cleaned_text: Naturopathic Medicine Naturopathic medicine is a distinct system of primary health care -an art, science, philosophy and practice of diagnosis, treatment and prevention of illness. Naturopathic care focuses on treating the whole person, not just the symptoms. Treating the symptoms of an illness is like popping a pill whenever you get a headache. The job of the medication is to stop the pain and it does. But then you get another headache a few days later. Why? Because something else is going on that your body is trying to alert you to. Symptoms are warning signs that something is wrong and the longer they're ignored, or swept under the rug with a pill, the stronger the underlying condition becomes. In our work as naturopathic physicians, we'll help you discover the underlying causes of your symptoms and work with you to heal your body. Whether you've had a throbbing headache for months, your child has a sniffle, or you just want to know what's going on in your body, naturopathic care can return your body to its natural, healthy rhythms. Have Questions? Appointments? We take the time to listen to your concerns, answer your questions, and support you every step of the way. Whether you are experiencing new symptoms, ongoing conditions or would like to feel more vital, we can help. Below is a partial list of conditions with which patients present: Immune Lyme disease & other tick borne illnesses, Colds & flus, Allergies, pneumonia, bronchitis Digestion IBS, Crohn disease, SIBO, colitis, food intolerances and sensitivities, digestive problems, reflux (GERD), diarrhea, constipation. Autoimmune disorders Hashimotos, Graves, lupus, rheumatoid arthritis, Sjogrens, diabetes, chronic fatigue, fibromyalgia. Mental-Emotional Memory, emotional stability, depression, anxiety, panic attacks, brain fog. Lifestyle counseling Stress management, creativity, and weight balancing. Pediatrics Ear infections, Rashes, Colds, Eczema, ADD/ADHD, Asthma, GERD, Food Allergies, Constipation Women's Health Fertility, pre-conception counseling, PMS, menopause, yeast infections, cervical dysplasia, abnormal uterine bleeding, [Midwifery Care](/wilderness) Hormone balance Hypothyroidism/hyperthyroidism, adrenal fatigue, hormone imbalance, menopause and perimenopause, amenorrhea. Heart disease High cholesterol, hypertension (high blood pressure), angina. Skin Acne, eczema, psoriasis, herpes.
